page.title: 07HOMES IN WEST EWELL
page.content: In the Riverview area of West Ewell in the year 1985,most of our children live in houses. Most of these houses are joined into a terrace,or semi-detached and made of brick. The roofs are ridged and made of tiles.The majority of the houses were built forty to fifty years ago, and quite a few are around fifteen years old, at which time a large number of council houses were built on an estate behind the school.All the houses have their own gardens.Including the lavatory,most houses have eight or nine rooms depending on whether they have two or three bedrooms, or whether they have a "through lounge" or a separate dining room.About half the children have their own bedroom.Most of the houses have central heating.
